home_paragraph: A stone's throw from the beach and close to restaurants, shops, the casino and the market. Our charming little hotel will allow you to fully enjoy Houlgate, «Pearl of the Flowered Coast».
Its location between Cabourg and Deauville will be an ideal starting point to discover our beautiful region.
